path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - MetaBomb Token - v1.1.pdf

findings.title: No vulnerability found
findings.description: The audit did not discover any vulnerabilities in the MetaBomb Token Smart Contract.

findings.title: BPContract function INFORMATIVE
findings.description: The bpContract function can be easily disabled anytime by the contract owner using the setBPEnabled function and is only used for a short time during token public sale IDO.
